mapper.select: SELECT a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.location_id , l.location_nm , a.device_oid , a.comm_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.comm_type) as comm_type_nm , a.device_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.device_type) as device_type_nm , a.node_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.node_type) as node_type_nm , a.ip , a.port , a.allow_yn , a.remark , a.parent_gw_id , apt.apt_no , apt.apt_nm , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.dest_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as dest_dt FROM GND_DEVICE_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_COMM_POINT comm ON (a.device_id = comm.device_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_SERVICE_POINT s ON (s.service_point_id = comm.service_point_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_APT_INFO apt ON (s.apt_no = apt.apt_no) INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l ON (a.location_id = l.location_id)

SELECT count(*) as co FROM GND_DEVICE_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_COMM_POINT comm ON (a.device_id = comm.device_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_SERVICE_POINT s ON (s.service_point_id = comm.service_point_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_APT_INFO apt ON (s.apt_no = apt.apt_no) INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l ON (a.location_id = l.location_id)

SELECT a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.location_id , l.location_nm , a.device_oid , a.comm_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.comm_type) as comm_type_nm , a.device_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.device_type) as device_type_nm , a.node_type , fnc_get_code_nm(a.node_type) as node_type_nm , a.ip , a.port , a.allow_yn , a.remark , a.parent_gw_id , apt.apt_no , apt.apt_nm , a.reg_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.reg_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as reg_dt , DATE_FORMAT(a.dest_dt,'${prop.dt.plain}') as dest_dt FROM GND_DEVICE_INFO a LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_COMM_POINT comm ON (a.device_id = comm.device_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_SERVICE_POINT s ON (s.service_point_id = comm.service_point_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN GND_APT_INFO apt ON (s.apt_no = apt.apt_no) INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l ON (a.location_id = l.location_id) WHERE device_id = #{deviceId}
SELECT a.device_id , a.device_serial , a.location_id , l.location_nm , l.region_id FROM GND_DEVICE_INFO a INNER JOIN GND_LOCATION l on (a.location_id = l.location_id) WHERE a.device_id = #{deviceId}
